philosophy_title: We are all part of the ant work
philosophy_text_1: The best work is the one done as a team. We have come this far thanks to all the people who have left their mark in Paliare.
philosophy_text_2: Ever since Paliare took off more than 20 years ago, its projects have been characterized by the feeling they provoke: harmony.
philosophy_subtitle: "I would do this even if it wasn't my job."
philosophy_section_2_text_1: Following the philosophy of the ant work
philosophy_section_2_text_2: We believe that each project is the result of combining:
philosophy_section_2_text_3: There's a special place where the heart beats steady, in which there's a specific serenity that only exists in a true home.
philosophy_section_2_text_4: Discover how we go beyond the physical space
